attributes.action: committ to annual live televised debates with other party leaders
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why are the US primaries inspiring so many first time voters to become interested in politics?  Why are they having the biggest voter turnout in a generation?  Simple.  Lived televised debates are an incredibly easy way for people to get involved & feel engaged in the political process.  It is also an effective tool in helping voters understand the values and cultures of their political leaders, rather than having to listen to electioneering & rhetoric.
